Room.Name: North Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: This is Brownhaven's northern bridge over the Baldywyne River.
Room.LongDescription: The river rushes by rapidly below your feet. There must have been a good deal of snow last winter.. The Baldywyne River has its headwaters high on Mount Caledonia to the north. Of course, its never been fully explored, so that's just a guess since it flows from there. No one has actually seen where it comes from.
